item.title: AWS Certified Data Analytics - Specialty
item.description: Service-wise Summary> Service-wise Summary # Athena> Athena # Compression Athena uses different compression methods based on the need: gzip: Used when focusing on reducing the size of data. lzo or snappy: Used when focusing on speed.
